title: Recommendation request
author: VD
content_html: What would the consciousness dabblers or evolutionary biologists here recommend for the latest books on the evolution of morality? Marc Hauser’s Moral Minds and Richard Joyce’s Evolution of Morality appear two of the more recommended books, is there anything else that is a must-have?
content_text: What would the consciousness dabblers or evolutionary biologists here recommend for the latest books on the evolution of morality?  Marc Hauser’s Moral Minds and Richard Joyce’s Evolution of Morality appear two of the more recommended books, is there anything else that is a must-have?
